info.description:
This is the API documentation for the Simulation Hockey League API. You can find out more about the SHL at [simulationhockey.com](https://simulationhockey.com/index.php). This API is a work in progress so expect future changes.
NOTE: Whenever left unspecified, the season defaults to the current one, the league defaults to the SHL (0), and the seasontype defaults to regular season.
info.title: Simulation Hockey League

tags.name: fantasy
tags.description: Lists all fantasy points for SHl players.
